title: Mystic

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Enact God's will during the day. If a non Town, non Neutral Benign role Is lynched today, you gain a layer of defense.
-**Intercept** a player during the night. If you have defense, you must use this ability.

desc:
Post 1399
*The Gods have given us salvation due to our good work.*
